printings.flavor: Only the best and the brightest can even test for acceptance at Polgek Academy.
Dekal's library is twenty stories tall, with six subbasements, containing millions of books and hundreds of labs.
Evavin's capital building powers the rest of the city with marble magitech engines.
Some of the abandoned cities outside of the Kelian League lie dormant, with security systems still operational.
Rilken stands, surrounded by malignant wilderness, protected by a shimmering forcefield.
Chesi's dangers come from within, with scheming sabotage and lurking Banished.
Even though the Multiplanar Festival of Arts only happens yearly, it promotes unity and joint focus year round.
While no one in Akieva is found wanting for food or shelter, some still  manage to do better than others.
The Vitin Academy's doors are open to everyone, provided they can keep up.
